title: ECB needs way of financing banks during wind-down: Constancio
text:
April 9, 2018 / 3:09 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago ECB needs way of financing banks during wind-down: Constancio Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
FRANKFURT (Reuters) - The European Central Bank needs a way of financing failing banks while they are being wound down, its vice-president said on Monday, citing Britain and the United States, where state-guarantees are extended on such loans, as a possible model. 
“The UK and U.S. have... a solid, whole process of resolution that includes those liquidity problems during that period of time and I hope that Europe will get to some solution to this problem,” Vitor Constancio told the European Parliament. Reporting By Francesco Canepa
